name: Bella Poarch
description:
'''Denarie Bautista Taylor'''
(born '''Belinda Marie Macadengdeng Batumbakal'''; February 9, 1997), known professionally as '''Bella Poarch''' ({{IPAc-en|p|ɔː|r|tʃ}} {{Respell|PORCH}}), is an American [[Influencer|social media personality]] and singer. She rose to fame after creating the most liked video on [[TikTok]] in August 2020,{{Efn|Although some sources have said the video was posted on August 18, 2020, such as [https://www.dexerto.com/entertainment/bella-poarch-celebrates-one-year-anniversary-of-viral-tiktok-that-made-her-famous-1634078/ Dexerto], (see [[WP:DEXERTO]]), others such as [[Wikipedia:RSMUSIC|reliable sources]],  [https://www.businessinsider.com/bella-poarch-tiktok-tyga-tattoo-navy-age-military-how-old-2020-10 Business Insider] and [https://www.stereogum.com/2097845/remember-blackpool-grime-it-now-soundtracks-the-most-popular-tiktok-of-all-time/news/ Stereogum],  have said August 17, 2020.}} in which she lip syncs to Millie B's song "[[M to the B]]". She is the [[List of most-followed TikTok accounts|fourth most-followed individual]] on the platform and the most followed person from the Philippines. 

In May 2021, Poarch signed a music record deal with [[Warner Records]]. Her debut single "[[Build a Bitch]]" was released that same year, which peaked at 56 on the [[Billboard Hot 100|''Billboard'' Hot 100]]. Her debut [[extended play]] ''Dolls'' was released in August 2022. She was also included on [[Forbes 30 Under 30|''Forbes'' 30 Under 30]] in 2022.
